name: Power Horse
description:
A story about an unstable Horse, stuck in a horse stable, with a steampunk twist. 

Try to stabilize your heat and steam level while traveling across the hellish barn you are stuck in. Too cold means you won’t be able to move. Too hot means more steam. But too much steam means you will go BOOM!!!!

This project was made for Ludum Dare 49 with theme "Unstable" (wink wink).
